text: Ezɨ Israelian mɨdorozim bar gavgavigha Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba adugha zuima me are. Ezɨ Devit uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko, men 700plan karisbagh isɨn ikia mɨsozir gumaziba ko 40,000plan nguazimɨn tuiva mɨsozir gumazibav soghezɨ, me ariaghire. Egha uaghan Sirian mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanim Sobak mɨsoghezɨma, a danganir kamrama areme.
